Sequence Information.Peptide Name: pBD-3 (pBD3; porcine beta-defensin 3, 3S=S, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; pigs, mammals; animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is unique and shows only very low similarity (71.11%) todog cBD103deltaG23C=R: 16%, K=G: 11%.  GRAVY: -0.505; Mol Wt:  4349.243; mol formula:  C181H312N62O50S6; mol ex coeff:  3355.Host expression: gene expression of porcine beta-defensin-1 (pBD-1), pBD-4, pBD-104, pBD-123, and pBD-125 were downregulated more than threefold in 2-wk-old congenitally infected pig lungs.Activity: pBD-3 inhibited porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome virus (PRRSV) in MARC-145 cells.
Literature Information.Author: Sang Y, Ruchala P, Lehrer RI, Ross CR, Rowland RR, Blecha F. 2009
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial host defense peptides in an arteriviral infection: differential peptide expression and virus inactivation.
